email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear John Doe,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 12,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is OCEAN MASTER, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our starting quote stands at USD 45.00 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 15 to October 20.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market conditions, could there be a possibility to review the rate? We are looking for a more competitive quote to align with our budget constraints.

Could you please consider this and provide a revised proposition?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. After considering the current market conditions, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 42.50 per MT. This adjustment reflects our commitment to providing competitive rates while ensuring the quality of service.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 42.50 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's loading rate to ensure there won't be issues during loading at Newcastle.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Coal Shipment: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the loading rate of OCEAN MASTER is 5,000MT per day, fully compatible with the loading facilities at Newcastle. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as October 15-20.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
John Doe
